div.p: Regular updates provided by Woburn Public School district to keep families informed about school closure. Please check this site regularly for the most up-to-date communications.

hr.p: Please click the link above to access our student registration page.Â Here you will find the forms required when registering your child for school in the Woburn Public Schools along with information regarding bus routes and street listings.Â
Kindergarten registration is postponed until school re-opens. Please check our website for updates.
